Package com.image_bs.mercherdiseinvestigation

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PlaceItem
    PlaceItem interface for place objects and categories.
    Question
    The Interface Question.
    ServerActionListener
    The listener interface for receiving serverAction events.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdapterWithCheck
    Custom ArrayAdapter for ListView with text and CheckBox.
    BasicQuestion
    The Class BasicQuestion is object for questions with answers that are not enumerable type.
    CategoriesReader
    Extends ServerResonse to specify server request to get categories from a specific company.
    CompaniesReader
    Extends ServerResonse to specify server request to get Companies that specific merchandiser is authenticated to check.
    ConnectionCheck
    For checking network connection.
    EnumQuestion
    Used to specify question of the merchandiser form.
    FormActivity
    Activity class for forms showing questions and answers and ability to choose answers.
    FormReader
    Extends ServerResonse to specify server request to get form that specific merchandiser must fill.
    HttpRequest
    Makes http requests with both POST and GET methods and gives InputStream result or null.
    InputStreamToJObject
    Class that handles InputStream containing JSONObject.
    Login
    Activity for user authentication Login is with email and pass.
    LoginRequest
    Class that prepares and handles login request.
    LoginStorage
    * Stores user information in the application private data.
    MyTextWatcher
    Abstract class used to make custom TextWatcher if question answer changes to do some action.
    NoServerConnection
    The Activity NoServerConnection need to be opened where there is network connection but there is no connection with the application's server.
    PlaceCategory
    The Class PlaceCategory.
    PlaceData
    The Class PlaceData.
    PlaceListAdapter
    The Class PlaceListAdapter.
    PlaceReader
    The Class PlaceReader.
    ProductsReader
    Extends ServerResonse to specify server request to get products from a specific company and category.

    The Class SaveData.

    The Activity class SelectCategory.

    The Activity class SelectCompany.

    The Activity class SelectPlace.

    The Class Validator.
